amount.description: Using the same annotation as MintCoins for consistency

MsgBurnCoins.title: Msg Burn Coins
MsgBurnCoins.description: MsgBurnCoins burns coins from the owner's balance, if each coin's root name is owned by that owner.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.
